org.drip.analytics.definition

Interface CurveConstructionInputSet

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BootCurveConstructionInput, CurveSpanConstructionInput, ShapePreservingCCIS, SmoothingCCIS

    public interface CurveConstructionInputSet
    CurveConstructionInputSet interface contains the Parameters needed for the Curve Calibration/Estimation. It's methods expose access to the following: - Calibration Valuation Parameters - Calibration Quoting Parameters - Array of Calibration Instruments - Map of Calibration Quotes - Map of Calibration Measures - Double Map of the Date/Index Fixings
